channel.title: Help me?
channel.description:
[b]When i open my client, and login, the "Sun" is "Normal".. so my question is how i make it "Very Bright" automatic.
I need it, when i open my client and login to see it "Very Bright" Not "Normal" * Sorry for my bad English hope you understood me" here is a picture:[/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/W5VvoLc.png[/img]
